mapper.sql: select ecg_id, patient_phone_aes, normal_ecg, ap_beat, pv_beat, atrial_fibrillation, atrial_flutter, left_block, right_block, bradycardia, tachycardia from single_history_info

select m.p_id, p.patient_code, m.hospital_code, m.equipment_code, connection_time, bed_number, case_history_number, ecg_type, online_status, patient_name_aes, patient_age, patient_sex, patient_source, m.patient_phone_aes, family_phone, monitoring_status, equipment_status, equipment_type, hospital_name, intelligent_diagnosis, diagnosis_status, diagnosis_conclusion, diagnosis_doctor_aes, report_time, ecg_level, doctor_phone_aes, birth_day, pacemaker, upload_time, guardianship_duration, sampling_rate, detection_state, end_time, time_duration, d_phone_aes, report_state,patient_symptom,report_normal,refuse_text,sx_report_status from patient_management m inner join patient p on p.patient_phone_aes = m.patient_phone_aes inner join equipment e on m.equipment_code = e.equipment_code left join hospital h on m.hospital_code = h.hospital_code left join report r on m.p_id = r.p_id

select count(0) from patient_management m left join report r on m.p_id = r.p_id
inner join patient p on p.patient_phone_aes = m.patient_phone_aes
left join hospital h on m.hospital_code = h.hospital_code
inner join equipment e on m.equipment_code = e.equipment_code
mapper.select: where diagnosis_status = 2 and d_phone_aes is null and diagnosis_doctor_aes is null order by report_time desc
where m.p_id = #{pId}
select patient_phone_aes from patient_management where p_id = #{pId}

SELECT COUNT(r.p_phone_aes) as totalSingle FROM report r INNER JOIN patient_management p ON r.p_id = p.p_id WHERE p.connection_time BETWEEN #{startReportTime} and DATE_ADD(#{endReportTime} ,INTERVAL 1 DAY)and r.p_phone_aes = #{pPhone} and p.ecg_type like concat(#{ecgType},'%')

SELECT COUNT(r.p_phone_aes) as totalConsult FROM report r INNER JOIN patient_management p ON r.p_id = p.p_id WHERE p.connection_time BETWEEN #{startReportTime} and DATE_ADD(#{endReportTime} ,INTERVAL 1 DAY)and r.p_phone_aes = #{pPhone} and r.diagnosis_status = '1'
where diagnosis_status = 2 and d_phone_aes is not null and diagnosis_doctor_aes is not null order by report_time desc
select * from patient_management limit #{start},#{end}
select * from single_history_info limit #{start},#{end}

select p.patient_phone_aes as patient_phone,p.family_phone,m.doctor_phone_aes from patient_management m inner join patient p on m.patient_phone_aes=p.patient_phone_aes where m.online_status=1 and m.equipment_code=#{deviceSn} -- order by m.connection_time desc -- limit 1
SELECT ecg_type as value , ecg_type as label FROM patient_management WHERE ecg_type like concat(#{ecgType},'%') GROUP BY ecg_type

SELECT patient_management.p_id, patient_management.equipment_code, patient_management.patient_code, patient_management.connection_time, patient_management.ecg_level, patient_management.ecg_type, patient_management.patient_phone_aes, patient_management.report_state, patient_management.time_duration, patient_management.generation_time, patient_management.detection_state, patient_management.end_time, patient_management.sampling_rate FROM patient_management where patient_management.p_id=#{pId}
mapper.insert:
insert into patient_management
patient_code, hospital_code, equipment_code, connection_time, bed_number, case_history_number, ecg_type, online_status, patient_phone_aes, ecg_level, doctor_phone_aes,
#{patientCode}, #{hospitalCode}, #{equipmentCode}, #{connectionTime}, #{bedNumber}, #{caseHistoryNumber}, #{ecgType}, #{onlineStatus}, #{patientPhone}, #{ecgLevel}, #{doctorPhone},
mapper.update:
update patient_management set online_status = 1 where patient_management.p_id in
#{pId}
update single_history_info set patient_phone_aes = #{patientPhone} where ecg_id = #{ecgId}
mapper.delete:
delete from patient_management where p_id in
#{pId}
